meanings.sent1: The misappraisals led to financial losses for the company.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent made misappraisals that affected the property's selling price.
meanings.sent3: The misappraisals in the antique shop caused quite a mix-up with the prices.
meanings.sent4: Her misappraisals of people's intentions often led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The misappraisals of the jewelry's value were revealed during the auction.

meanings.definition: Mistakes in appraising or evaluating something.
meanings.sent1: The misappraisals in the art collection were discovered during the audit.
meanings.sent2: Avoiding misappraisals is crucial in the field of antique appraisal.
meanings.sent3: The misappraisals of the rare coins made the numismatist chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His misappraisals of his own abilities held him back from success.
meanings.sent5: The misappraisals of the situation led to a comedy of errors.
